nodes.text: Dimalium-6 was a chemical substance mined and distilled by the Sith Empire. It was of special interest to Imperial Intelligence because of its psychoactive properties. Dimalium-6 enhanced the effects of spice and had disruptive effects on both memory and mood.
Imperial Intelligence used dimalium-6 as a component of IX serum, a powerful compound that allowed for brainwashing triggered by a keyword.
